content.rendered:
Zero Fog ensures an optimal and long-lasting vision thanks to
its anti-fog, detergent and antistatic properties.
It is extremely effecient on all types of glasses, which lenses are
made of glass, plastic or polycarbonate. Excellent also on
glasses, sunglasses, athletes and masks. It works perfectly on
all lenses treated with anti-reflex, anti-scratch, anti-pollutions.
It doesn’t damage treated or colored surfaces. It contains
neither silicones nor propellants, consequently it is eco-
compatible, produced with raw materials “made in Germany”.
